project.title: Project
project.content: Managed the Magento 2 integration and deployment of the Octopia marketplace for Morocco's leading retailer, Marjane. Organized and executed the reversibility process for the mobile application, transitioning ownership from the service provider to the client. This included managing timelines, coordinating multiple teams, and delivering the final versions of the application on Google Play and the Apple Store. Delivered a hybrid React Native mobile app and supported a catalog of 70,000+ products with a roadmap to scale to 1 million.

Established a new release deployment workflow, improving update frequency and stability
